front.title: Guidelines for Usage of Interactive Connectivity Establishment (ICE) by non Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Protocols

abstract.t: Interative Connectivity Establishment (ICE) has been specified as aNAT traversal mechanism for protocols based on the offer/answerexchange model. In practice, only the Session Initiation Protocol(SIP) has used ICE. This document provides guidance on how otherprotocols can make use of ICE.
